posts.post_content: Would like to pick up the T207 cards of Scott, Saier, Rath, Hamilton, Ryan, Mitchell and Zieder.

Hey Larry,

I have a couple you're looking for - see [url]http://imageevent.com/gspinf/forsaletrade/tradematerial[/url].  Hamilton, Scott, Mitchell (at least one of them).  Believe I also have a Ryan, but do not think it is listed there.

--
Mike
